issue.title: [C++] Increase public API testing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11761](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11761). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, in `public_api_test.cc` we check various `api.h` files, but not all of them (since some of them depend on build options). We should ideally test all public APIs for private symbol leaks.
